attributes.description: A Beautiful Classic, The Guilietta Has Become Very Desirable. This Vehicle Is Totally Original And Drives Extremely Well. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
